thoughts.text: I think I will use the execute_shell command to open a web browser and browse the Go To Brno website to learn more about the Brno Reservoir trail and the educational trail with six ecologically focused stations.
thoughts.reasoning: The web_search command was successful in finding the Go To Brno website, but I was not able to find the information I needed. By using the execute_shell command to open a web browser, I can navigate the website and find the information I need.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the execute_shell command to open a web browser
- Navigate to the Go To Brno website
- Find information on the Brno Reservoir trail and the educational trail with six ecologically focused stations
thoughts.criticism: I should have tried the execute_shell command earlier instead of relying on the web_search command.
thoughts.speak: I will use the execute_shell command to open a web browser and navigate to the Go To Brno website to find more information about the trails.
